segments.text: Excuse me . I'm your new neighbor , Jack . I just moved in .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm looking for a grocery store . Are there any around here ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , there are some on Pine Street .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK . And is there a laundromat near here ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I think there's one across from the shopping center .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: By the way , there's a barber shop in the shopping center , too .
segments.speaker: S2
